education_text.0: Cliff Jones was a      professor at the      Victoria University of Manchester Victoria University of Manchester in the 1980s and early 1990s, worked in industry at Harlequin for a period, and is now a Professor of Computing Science at      Newcastle University Newcastle UniversityCliff Jones was a      professor at the      Victoria University of Manchester Victoria University of Manchester in the 1980s and early 1990s, worked in industry at Harlequin for a period, and is now a Professor of Computing Science at      Newcastle University Newcastle UniversityJones has authored and edited many books, including
